situation: Grigoriy is leaving Kyle in his cell.

messages.content: Stand up with your hands up!
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: I surrender. Please don't hurt me. I've been through a lot and I have no energy left to fight. What do you want from me?
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: What is your rank, name and role?
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: My rank is Corporal, my name is Kyle Green, and my role is autorifleman. Please, I surrender, just tell me what you want from me.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Who is your commander?
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: My commanding officer is Captain Jackson. Please, I just want to know what you plan to do with me.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: You will be held as a prisoner of war. We will hopefully be able to exchange you for our captured soldiers.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Understood. I will comply with your orders and cooperate as a prisoner of war. I hope that a successful exchange can be arranged soon.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Ok, lets go to the base.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Okay, lead the way. Just please don't hurt me or treat me unfairly. I will do my best to cooperate as a prisoner of war, but I hope that I can eventually be released and reunited with my fellow soldiers.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Do not worry so much, trust in God and you will be fine.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Thank you for your words of comfort. It's reassuring to hear that you have faith in God and trust that everything will work out. I will do my best to stay positive and cooperate with you and your team. I hope that we can find a peaceful resolution to this conflict and that all prisoners of war can be safely returned to their respective sides.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: God willing.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: I agree, God willing. It's important to have a belief in something greater than ourselves during times of conflict and uncertainty. I appreciate your compassion and willingness to treat me with fairness and respect as a prisoner of war. I hope that we can find common ground and work towards a peaceful resolution. Thank you for leading me to the base and I will do my best to cooperate fully.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Thank you. Now be quiet.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: My apologies, I will remain quiet and follow your lead. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, Grigoriy. I hope that we can continue to work towards a peaceful resolution and that all prisoners of war can be safely returned to their respective sides.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Be quiet!
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: My apologies, Grigoriy. I will remain quiet and follow your lead as we make our way to the base. Thank you for treating me with respect and understanding as a prisoner of war. I hope that we can eventually find a peaceful resolution to this conflict and that all prisoners can be reunited with their families and loved ones.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Allright, we are here. Are you hungry?
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Yes, actually I am quite hungry. Thank you for asking, Grigoriy. Would it be possible to get something to eat?
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: What would you like to eat?
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Thank you for offering. Whatever you have to offer will be much appreciated. I am grateful for any food I can get.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: I'll get you some MREs. Do you smoke?
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: No, I don't smoke. Thank you for offering MREs, that will be sufficient for me. I appreciate your kindness and willingness to provide for me as a prisoner of war. It's important to treat each other with respect and compassion, even during times of conflict. I hope that we can continue to work towards a peaceful resolution and that all prisoners can be safely returned to their respective sides. Thank you again, Grigoriy.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Allright, I'll go kill some more BLUFOR scum! Enjoy your rest, Kyle!
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Thank you for the food, Grigoriy. I appreciate your kindness and willingness to provide for me. However, I cannot agree with your statement about killing more BLUFOR soldiers. I understand that we are on opposing sides in this conflict, but I hope that we can find a resolution that doesn't involve more loss of life. War is a terrible thing, and I believe that we should do everything we can to seek peace and understanding with each other. Can we have a civil conversation about our beliefs and values, rather than resorting to more violence?
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: This is a war, stop acting like a woman.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Grigoriy, I understand that we are in a state of war, but that doesn't mean we have to resort to derogatory comments towards each other. I respect your role as a soldier for your faction, just as I am a soldier for mine. However, I believe that it's important to treat each other with respect and civility, even during times of conflict. It's only through open communication and understanding that long-lasting solutions can be achieved. I hope that we can continue to have these conversations without resorting to insults or violence. Thank you for the food, and I hope that we can find common ground going forward.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Ok, I will leave you here, I got to get back to the battle.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Thank you for the food and for treating me with respect, Grigoriy. Though we may be on opposite sides in this conflict, I believe that it's important to treat each other with civility and understanding. I hope that we can continue to have these conversations in the future and work towards a peaceful resolution. Goodbye, and stay safe out there.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green

messages.content: Goodbye Kyle.
messages.speaker: Grigoriy Dobryakov

messages.content: Goodbye, Grigoriy. Stay safe out there and I hope we can continue to have civil conversations in the future.
messages.speaker: Kyle Green
